ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: One of the reasons the LoGP was so overvalued for so long was that Allkazam s posted it doubled the effectiveness of Hymn compared to Hymn + regular lute.
ygData.messageBody:
One of the reasons the LoGP was so overvalued for so long was that
Allkazam's posted it doubled the effectiveness of Hymn compared to Hymn +
regular lute.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 02, 2000 6:56 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
>
>
> I always wondered why the No Drop quest Gypsy Lute had better
> bonuses than
> the Lute of the Gypsy Princess. It would seem that the LoGP is highly
> over-valued when it comes to auctions.
>
> Mind you, isn't everything? ;)
>
> -KS
>
> >Hang out in Mistmoore and maybe you can get one from a
> >gypsy musician. The gypsy lute adds 5% and a +mr stat.
